tier.item: (12) ichakey ku u ka-ngay mu ja.
"My desire is your coming here." Or "I want you to come here"

ichakey ku u ka-ngay mu ja.

I want you to come here

tier.item: She cooks and washes the dishes.
(14) panutung-an ku anchi u p<in>arin aya ni ama kakuyab.
cook-LOC 1SG this NOM make<PA.PAT> this GEN father yesterday
"I will cook in this (which) father made yesterday."
